QUD.string: {How is the way things are at t0?}

QUD.UNIT: Susie lifts the lid of the abandoned teapot
The teabag sloshes against the sides
The tea is cold and bitter.

QUD.string: {Does Susie mind (that the tea is cold and bitter)}?

QUD.UNIT: because her landlady normally reuses tea bags.
Usually the tea mostly tastes of chlorine.
Susie rubs the place where the elastic cap from work scrunched all day.

UNIT.NAI: As she checks Mrs Simpson’s calendar

QUD.UNIT: The skin feels puckered and soft
like white and wrinkly fingertips in the bath

UNIT.NAI: Her mother used to read beside the clawfoot bathtub her father imported from England.
